about_the_game:
Oh my goodness! It's a heartwarming feeling. It's a relaxed and enjoyable live action interactive video game. Players will enter an interesting story from the perspective of the female protagonist, solving events together with the four characters in the game and gaining a rich emotional experience of the characters. Which one is your ideal choice: a gentle CEO whom you met by chance, a warm-hearted lawyer with superpowers, a lovely junior whom you have known for many years, and a proud and charming expert who has traveled from ancient times?


Name: Ye Zhiheng
Age: 29 years old
Constellation: Capricorn
Occupation: President of Qingshan Group
Ability: Money ability
Personality:
On the surface, he is cold but on the inside, he is passionate. As the president of a large enterprise, he acts decisively and swiftly, is accustomed to making decisions, and is accustomed to being in control of everything by his leader. Due to living in a high-pressure environment since childhood, his parents have extremely strict requirements for him in order to cultivate him into an excellent successor to the family business, which has led to a lack of love in his private heart and a lack of security when facing the person he likes.


Name: Jiang Yuxuan
Age: 20 years old
Constellation: Pisces
Occupation: Entertainment company idol trainee
Ability: Superb talent
Personality:
Lively and cheerful, enthusiastic and sunny, with strong athletic ability, singing and dancing seem to be innate, energetic, fond of art, and full of love for all interesting things. When I was in school, I met my senior sister and the female lead, and I had a crush on her. Later, I joined the entertainment company where the female lead works and became an idol trainee. I worked very hard and seriously, hoping to successfully debut as a celebrity idol.


Name: Xu Yifan
Age: 26 years old
Constellation: Taurus
Occupation: Lawyer
Ability: Summoning Spell Superability
Personality:
Gentle and considerate, intellectually calm, thoughtful, empathetic, loving to take care of others, a warm man. When I was a child, I lived in the same orphanage with the female protagonist. Later, I was adopted. In addition to being a top student, my emotions were stable and always gentle, and I also had the superpower to summon items in my heart. Helpless superpower performance is unstable, the probability of success is not high, and it cannot be trained to improve. Often summoning some strange items, I am also unable to laugh or cry, and I feel a bit shy when embarrassing in front of someone I like.


Name: Shen Xuanqing
Age: 24 years old
Constellation: Scorpio
Occupation: Divine Shield Sect Leader, Martial Arts Master
Ability: Excellent martial arts skills
Personality:
Proud and delicate, with a disdainful attitude towards honesty and integrity, appearing cold and difficult to get along with on the surface, but actually relying heavily on the female protagonist in her heart. She was a childhood sweetheart of the female protagonist in ancient times, and the two families married each other. She grew up protecting the female protagonist as a beloved child. After the mysterious disappearance of the ancient female leader, she tracked all the way to modern times, found the female leader, and wanted to take her back. But the female leader was a modern version, and she did not remember the ancient things. She was a little anxious, angry, distressed, and wronged. On the surface, she was cold and disliked, and she still loved the female leader deeply.

We hope you enjoy our game and are welcome to join our player base

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel-Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX960 or AMD Radeom R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It is strongly recommended to install it on a solid state drive, otherwise it may affect the unresponsive prompt when the program is loaded. At this point just wait for the loading

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel-Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It is strongly recommended to install it on a solid state drive, otherwise it may affect the unresponsive prompt when the program is loaded. At this point just wait for the loading

short_description: What is the most heart wrenching moment for you? Is it a warm smile from the person you like? Or was it a sudden surprise waiting for him? Is it the sweet expectation of ordinary life? Or a sudden look back after a thousand twists and turns—— Oh my goodness! It's a heartwarming feeling.

English, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese
